Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Utils

extends java.lang.Object

      • calcHopDistance

        public static double calcHopDistance(int m,
                     int n)
        Calculates the average hop distance given the topology size.
        Parameters:
        m - The number of tiles in the first dimension of the topology
        n - The number of tiles in the second dimension of the topology
        Returns:
        The average hop distance (cm)
